paper_abstract: Let a differential system A (1) y' + A (0) y = 0 be of full rank and the matrix A (1) be possibly singular. Let a part of unknowns (components of a vector y) be selected. For this case, an algorithm is proposed that yields a system of the form a >>(1)' for some part a >>(1) of components of the vector y, with the selected entries of y that do not belong to a >>(1) being linearly expressed via the selected entries that are in a >>(1).
paper_title: Differential equation systems with selected part of the unknowns
